methods.name: defineType
methods.comment:
Define a bookmark type with its marker icon and color.  The icon and color
 values are not permanently stored.  Therefor, this method must be re-invoked
 by a plugin each time a program is opened if a custom icon and color 
 are desired.

params.name: type
params.comment: bookmark type

params.name: icon
params.comment: marker icon which may get scaled

params.name: color
params.comment: marker color

methods.javadoc: Returns list of known bookmark types.
methods.name: getBookmarkTypes
methods.comment: Returns list of known bookmark types.

methods.name: getBookmarkType
methods.comment: Get a bookmark type

params.name: type
params.comment: bookmark type name

return.comment: bookmark type or null if type is unknown

methods.name: getCategories
methods.comment: Get list of categories used for a specified type

params.name: type
params.comment: bookmark type

methods.name: setBookmark
methods.comment: Set a bookmark.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address at which to set a bookmark

params.name: type
params.comment: the name of the bookmark type.

params.name: category
params.comment: the category for the bookmark.

params.name: comment
params.comment: the comment to associate with the bookmark.

methods.name: getBookmark
methods.comment: Get a specific bookmark

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address of the bookmark to retrieve

params.name: type
params.comment: the name of the bookmark type.

params.name: category
params.comment: the category of the bookmark.

return.comment: the bookmark with the given attributes, or null if no bookmarks match.

methods.javadoc:
Remove bookmark
@param bookmark the bookmark to remove.
methods.name: removeBookmark
methods.comment: Remove bookmark

params.name: bookmark
params.comment: the bookmark to remove.

methods.javadoc:
Removes all bookmarks of the given type.
@param type bookmark type
methods.name: removeBookmarks
methods.comment: Removes all bookmarks of the given type.

params.name: type
params.comment: bookmark type

methods.name: removeBookmarks
methods.comment: Removes all bookmarks with the given type and category.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of the bookmarks to be removed.

params.name: category
params.comment: bookmark category of the types to be removed.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: a task monitor to report the progress.

throws.comment: if the user (via the monitor) cancelled the operation.

methods.name: removeBookmarks
methods.comment: Removes all bookmarks over the given address set.

params.name: set
params.comment: the set of addresses from which to remove all bookmarks.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: a taskmonitor to report the progress.

throws.comment: if the user (via the monitor) cancelled the operation.

methods.name: removeBookmarks
methods.comment: Removes all bookmarks of the given type over the given address set

params.name: set
params.comment: the set of addresses from which to remove all bookmarks of the given type.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of bookmarks to remove.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: a taskmonitor to report the progress.

throws.comment: if the user (via the monitor) cancelled the operation.

methods.name: removeBookmarks
methods.comment: Removes all bookmarks of the given type and category over the given address set

params.name: set
params.comment: the set of addresses from which to remove all bookmarks of the given type and category.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of bookmarks to remove.

params.name: category
params.comment: the category of bookmarks to remove.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: a taskmonitor to report the progress.

throws.comment: if the user (via the monitor) cancelled the operation.

methods.name: getBookmarks
methods.comment: Get bookmarks of the indicated type on a specific address

params.name: address
params.comment: the address at which to search for bookmarks.

params.name: type
params.comment: bookmark type to search for

methods.name: getBookmarks
methods.comment: Get all bookmarks on a specific address

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address at which to retrieve all bookmarks.

methods.name: getBookmarkAddresses
methods.comment: Get addresses for bookmarks of a specified type.

params.name: type
params.comment: bookmark type

return.comment: address set containing bookmarks of the specified type.

methods.name: getBookmarksIterator
methods.comment: Get iterator over all bookmarks of the specified type.

params.name: type
params.comment: the bookmark type to search for

return.comment: an iterator over all bookmarks of the specified type.

methods.javadoc: Returns an iterator over all bookmarks.
methods.name: getBookmarksIterator
methods.comment: Returns an iterator over all bookmarks.

methods.name: getBookmarksIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over all bookmark types, starting at the given address, with traversal
 in the given direction.

params.name: startAddress
params.comment: the address at which to start

params.name: forward
params.comment: true to iterate in the forward direction; false for backwards

return.comment:
an iterator over all bookmark types, starting at the given address, with traversal
 		   in the given direction.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the bookmark that has the given id or null if no such bookmark exists.
@param id the id of the bookmark to be retrieved.
methods.name: getBookmark
methods.comment: Returns the bookmark that has the given id or null if no such bookmark exists.

params.name: id
params.comment: the id of the bookmark to be retrieved.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if program contains one or more bookmarks of the given type.
@param type the type of bookmark to check for.
methods.name: hasBookmarks
methods.comment: Returns true if program contains one or more bookmarks of the given type.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of bookmark to check for.

methods.javadoc:
Return the number of bookmarks of the given type.
@param type the type of bookmarks to count.
methods.name: getBookmarkCount
methods.comment: Return the number of bookmarks of the given type.

params.name: type
params.comment: the type of bookmarks to count.

methods.javadoc: Returns the total number of bookmarks in the program.
methods.name: getBookmarkCount
methods.comment: Returns the total number of bookmarks in the program.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the program associated with this BookmarkManager.
@return the program associated with this BookmarkManager.
methods.name: getProgram
methods.comment: Returns the program associated with this BookmarkManager.

return.comment: the program associated with this BookmarkManager.
